title: DVD X Studios CloneDVD 6.0.0.1

CloneDVD- Perfect 1:1 DVD Copy:

-Ultimate solution for DVD backup, copy, burning, clone, rip and decryption

CloneDVD is the world best and easiest-to-use DVD copy software to copy/burn/rip/encrypt any DVD movies by removing all existing DVD protections automatically.

CloneDVD supports to compress/shrink DVD9 to DVD 5, copy DVD9 to DVD9 and DVD5 to DVD5 perfectly, split or divide DVD9 into 2 DVD5 and even convert DVD to MP4, DVD to 3GP, DVD to AVI, etc.

CloneDVD Features:
==================

Copy/Burn/Rip ANY DVD Movie
